title: 2015–16 Håndboldligaen
text:
The 2015–16 Håndboldligaen (known as the "Boxer Herreligaen" for sponsorship reasons) is the 80th season of the <a href="Danish%20Handball%20League">Håndboldligaen</a>, <a href="Denmark">Denmark</a>'s premier <a href="Handball">Handball</a> league.
Team information.
The following 14 clubs compete in the Håndboldligaen during the 2015–16 season:
Personnel and kits.
Following is the list of clubs competing in "2015–16 Håndboldligaen", with their manager, kit manufacturer and shirt sponsor.
Regular season.
Schedule and results.
No. 1-8 from the regular season divided into two groups with the top two will advance to the semifinals

Relegation Playoff.
No. 12-13 from Håndboldligaen and no. 2-3 from the first division is meet each other for the last 2 seats. The winner stays in the league. the loser relegated to Division 1, <a href="http%3A//kampe.dhf.dk/dhf/Turneringer-og-resultater/Pulje-Stilling.aspx%3FPuljeId%3D40297"></a> <a href="http%3A//kampe.dhf.dk/dhf/Turneringer-og-resultater/Pulje-Stilling.aspx%3FPuljeId%3D40298"></a>
